Name: Sammy Rivera
Text: It's a very fun game very much like the game of life, you can also play online multiplayer which is amazing, and there's pass and play so you can play it without buying the board game!
Label: positive

Name: Kaylin F
Text: Game is okay but for the price I wouldn't really say worth it. Its very short and I have had it freeze on me 3 or 4 times. When it freezes you miss out on some in game stuff and it just jumps to your turn so you don't really know what happened. It has a bunch of potential but I wouldn't say its worth the money at this point. Make the board longer or at least give the option for a longer board and work out the little kinks and it would definitely be a great game
Label: negative

Name: Mr. Cooper
Text: Problems: 1. 5x game speed resets every time a human player has a turn. 1x speed is far too slow even for a human player. 2. 5x game mode causes the game to regularly freeze. 3. There is no variation between maps other than the art. 4. 30 children requires too many replays of map to secure the collectible. The number required should be akin to the house requirement. 5. The intro should be skipable. 6. The computer AI too frequently makes poor decisions. 7. The spinner is RNG controlled.
Label: negative

Name: Erik Hunt (whiskyjacked)
Text: Kinda fun, but you have to buy more maps...after buying the game!! What a joke! I can understand having to unlock more maps/boards but not having to BUY them all. And the game is pretty fun, but $35 on sale is what it costs on top of the game purchase to unlock the other boards. Shameful. Update!: It also loves to randomly freeze up completely!
Label: negative

Name: Shana King
Text: Fun but the game keeps freezing and I have to hit save and quit to get it to unfreeze. Once it froze right at the end though when it was determining the winner and I had to force course and that game progress was lost. Now I'm having it so that it will randomly shut down completely and close the game on me. I was hoping to not have any issues but I'm not willing to buy the expansions as is right now.
Label: negative

Name: Angel Smith
Text: This game could be more fun if like someone said, there were longer boards. It does feel too short at times. But my main hangup is that this game freezes way too much. And it's not even my phone. I know ppl on other phones that it happens to. Shame but I really feel this should be free. Or at least no more than a few dollars for the whole thing (all expansion packs included).
Label: negative

Name: Breyden Coates
Text: Occasionally the game just freezes and you have to close the app to fix this. It's happened 5 times on the final point screen and I didn't get to see the points or who won. I've only had game a day. If it weren't for the freezes this would be a great app.
Label: negative

Name: J Ahn
Text: Fun game but freezes too much. Well not so much as completely frozen but it will not progress at times. Animation and sound still works but nothing happens until I restart the App. Edit: I cleared my cache and no longer had this issue. Not sure if its the app or my phone but will update if I encounter freezes again.
Label: negative

Name: Alex Wawroski
Text: A whole lot of fun, and surprisingly charming art and animation! I don't recommend the 5x speed up option because it causes freezes, but you can just minimize the number of opponents to speed things up instead.
Label: positive

Name: Saltiest Meatball
Text: Deapite having a top of the line phone and 5G/1GB Wifi, the game still refuses to play well. Constantly freezes either during the game or during the score tallying, forcing you to void the whole game. Happens basically every other game. I would vote 0 stars if I could. Poor optimization.
Label: negative

Name: Terri Charlton
Text: Game constantly freezes! I have missed many of the final scores due to the game freezing. When it freezes during gameplay, I can save and quit and return but the final score is pretty important and it won't allow me to save and return at that point.
Label: negative

Name: Evan Tolstov
Text: This is a great game. However, it tends to freeze up on my turn quite a bit. It'll just keep being stuck in the screen until enough time passes when the game will play for me, at which point all I have left to do is just exit the game. It's a fun game, but it's sad that this is an issue. It keeps happening pretty often.
Label: negative

Name: Stephen Callans
Text: The game is pretty fun. I bought the package with all the boards and now it won't let me play the single player mode. I have to pass and play or play online. Can you fix this? Update: had to uninstall and then reinstall he game. Works ok now. Does freeze from time to time. Not sure why. Pretty fun though.
Label: positive

Name: Tejas Karandikar
Text: The game is great but the only issues are that the game sometimes freezes and lags at most of the stages... Also the original way of spinning the dial should be brought back in order to decide who plays first... Other features that need to be introduced are, actual players in single mode by random matching and also more worlds, but for free...
Label: negative

Name: Holly Bunn
Text: While playing the game it freezes and I have to exit out and get back into the game even than it freezes about 4 more times before I can finish the game I love the game when it freezes on single player mode (waiting for a player) it makes me not want to play it anymore
Label: negative

Name: Amanda Rok
Text: What a waste of money. Game worked perfectly when I was getting my ass kicked. As soon as I waa going to win a single game, it froze after showing money earned and didn't progress to points earned or who won the game. I do not give negative reviews often, but I also do not spend money on games often. Don't waste your money!!!
Label: negative

Name: Shelley Balsley
Text: The game keeps freezing up and I have to quit and then load save game. Beyond that the game could be a little more animated with the choices. I would have rated the game a 3 or 4 if it would quit freezing though.
Label: negative

Name: Kookie's cookie
Text: Game is great and so fun. However, lately, my single games keep freezing and I don't get anything from them. Even if I "Save and Leave" when I get back it opens a new game and all the progress is gone. I hope this issue can be solved so I can play.
Label: negative

Name: Bhutwheyt Therismor
Text: I had it at two because it wouldn't stop freezing, then it froze three more times in a row. A friend of mine is having the same issue. I don't like that I payed for something that doesn't work. If it gets fixed I'll buy the season pass, but it's unplayable until then.
Label: negative

Name: Colleen Trump
Text: The game freezes constantly. You can't get to any other boards unless you pay. I thought maybe you could when you win all the collectibles, but that doesn't do anything at all. Pretty disappointing considering I had to pay for this app.
Label: negative

Name: Caleb Carr (Teaer)
Text: Game constantly freezes on other players loading screens. The puzzle pieces for creating a family is hard to complete, since landing on those squares is hard. The fantasy board needs more immersion. Game is fun when it is working.
Label: negative

Name: F. PWALYM
Text: This is good, but can you make it more complex like The Game of Life (1998)?? Also the game is so often to freeze, especially after a player/computer moves... Fix this please... Or can you make New Version of the game?? With the same energy just Like "The Game of Life (1998)" on Playstation One/PSX....
Label: negative

Name: Pam tatum
Text: It's a fun game me and my family play it on family night, but we are unable to change our names in the game it just says "Player"
Label: positive

Name: Caleb Carter
Text: Game freezes (I'm literally on a new generation phone) constantly and it's repetitive and boring. Its too fast to end and too slow to play. Not with $1 let alone its actual price of $3.99. Any and all dlc is $4.99. Highly unrecommend this.
Label: negative

Name: Courtney Davis
Text: I have the first game of life as well. So that's two games I have bought from yall so far pluse I paid for the season on the first one. Both of your games are laggy and freeze up, albeit the second one less. Just really disappointed in the fact that your games run so poorly.
Label: negative

Name: Cheyenne
Text: Horrible. There's a very limited amount of things to do in the game and it has a tendency to frequently freeze and force you to restart the app, which can lose progress you made.
Label: negative

Name: Amanda Taylor
Text: The games is good but it keeps freezing when playing against computer. I would like fast forward when playing online as I'm bored waiting. The game could be longer. More chances to buy houses and have children and pets
Label: negative

Name: Trinette
Text: I love it, It runs smoothly. The only problem that sometimes happens is when you change it to 5x it freezes and you have to reload it to continue. But other then that it's great.
Label: positive

Name: Brady McCown
Text: Fun game, brings back alot of memories. However the biggest problem I have is it freezes in the middle of the game everytime i play, have to close the app then reboot.
Label: negative

Name: steve carr
Text: Great game, needs work. Game freezes about every third or fourth game forcing a restart. Otherwise it's a great way to spend some time.
Label: positive

Name: lilladyo2cute
Text: The game freezes sometimes. I hate that i paid for an app that you have to pay to get all the boards. You should be able to unlock new worlds by completing all the puzzles in a collection. What are the collections for besides items?
Label: negative

Name: Rachael Hill
Text: Like the game but it keeps freezing up and I have to close it out and then open it again for it to work. It just happened at the end of the game and I wasn't able to see who won. A little aggravating. Other than that, I really do like the app. Its fun.
Label: negative

Name: Brittany M
Text: I noticed this game will freeze when I fast forward while playing with the computers. When the app and come back, the game is no longer there.
Label: negative

Name: Diana Bell
Text: Game freezes constantly I have yet to play a round of just vs computer without a total freeze and restart need to pay for any type of upgrade. Not worth it
Label: negative

Name: Enya (Enya)
Text: This game constantly freezes.. very boring, limited choices, charges way too much money. I refunded as its to expensive for what it is. Play with bots you hardly play at all.
Label: negative

Name: Amanda Chin
Text: Game freezes and/or lags here and there on occasion. It's very annoying and frustrating. Other than that, it's also very challenging to win games.
Label: negative

Name: Michael Sooy
Text: Great game however, There is a few bugs like it freezing when your online. I think you should be able to get a pet and a kid but overall great game.
Label: positive

Name: shawn kim
Text: It's very SLOW and Freeze A LOTS in middle of the Game. I have to restart a Whole LOT. And lost ALL my Accomplishments and my Purchase stages. I don't know if I can get my REFUNDS or NOT. This Game is Not WORTH Your money and Times. .
Label: negative

Name: Jessica Nottingham
Text: It was okay. For $3.99, I expected there to be a lot more things you can do. I was disappointed that the other boards in the game were another $3.99 each. Also, game kept freezing pretty bad.
Label: neutral

Name: DrunkPauloCosta
Text: Screw everyone who gave this a good review. Its literally basic and shorter than the other one and instead of making longer versions of the game for 2 players ect its just basically game of life but somehow less fun than number 1. Like what the hell how this got to be an official squel upsets me and i wasted 7 bucks.
Label: negative

Name: shelley Dalton
Text: I dropped my rating from 4 stars to 2 stars for freezing in middle of game play problem.This game is fun and I play every chance I get but it keeps freezing up and I have to get completely out of the game,really love this game and as soon as the freezing problem is fixed I will give it 5 stars again
Label: negative

Name: Amy Johnson
Text: I would rate 5 stars all the way across if the different worlds were shareable like the app itself. It's no fun to only have one person see the new world. I downloaded Frozen Lands so we could all play it.
Label: neutral

Name: pshelbs23
Text: Worked perfectly at first. After a couple of games the app kept bugging and freezing mid game after someone's turn. Absolutely broken.
Label: negative

Name: Karen B
Text: I'm not sure why this is not cheaper with it freezing all the time. I'd give it 5 if you can fix the freezing. I've only been playing for 1 hr
Label: negative

Name: Justin Stroud
Text: Freezes on computers turn, playing with spouse it froze in her turn and kicked her out. The computer took over her rounds. This is persistent.
Label: negative

Name: Todd Paeper
Text: Fun game but it freezes a lot. About every other game is affected. This is the only Marmalade game I've played that freezes up like this.
Label: negative

Name: Dylan Yeager
Text: Keeps freezing on "Waiting for 'computer player name'" Won't let me pause to save and quit either. My app is fully updated.
Label: negative

Name: Stephen Briggs
Text: Game keeps freezing in the middle of the game as the npc's in single player can't decide what to do. Refunding the game.
Label: negative

Name: Deb L
Text: Works great, until it doesn't. The game is fun, but it freezes when I receive notifications via any other app.
Label: negative

Name: kandi kane
Text: It freezes up constantly and then kicks you out the game. Ive only had for a hour and i have been kicked off twice. Money wasted smh.
Label: negative

Name: Alexus Matchett
Text: Love Love Love it!!! Awesome graphics and you don't have to pay for coins unless you want to. Also there are no ads!!!!
Label: positive

Name: Bradley Hunt
Text: I'd give it 5 stars but for 5 bucks on the frostland we should have at least reindeer as pets or polar bears. üêª üíò And on side note for the 5th star with the family pets, at least would make the pets white for dog's "Huskys" for example But other than that it's a cool game
Label: positive

Name: Mark Hirsch (SSMD999)
Text: The game should be little bit longer it is too short than the previous game also the game takes too long loading up and freezing a lot
Label: negative

Name: Jessilyn Gray
Text: Game kept kicking me out I was only able to play one game all the way through then it kept kicking me out or freezing. I want my money back
Label: negative

Name: Robert Cedeno
Text: Great game gets long add chat for wait , and also allow us to add friends with players we played with , since most people we know don't play.
Label: positive

Name: Jasmine Rose
Text: I love this game, lots of fun. I have given it 4 star's as sometimes the game freezes otherwise it would of been 5 star's.
Label: positive

Name: Stephanie Trudeau
Text: Already paid for the game but to unlock it all you need to pay $34.99... it also freezes up mid and end game at times
Label: negative

Name: Jeu Escobido
Text: It freezes mid game. Can click menu, end game etc but game wont continue. Needs update.
Label: negative

Name: Alex Bowman
Text: Fun, like the collectibles
Label: positive

Name: Manuel Torrez
Text: Can't play with friends do to app code system kicking off my friends and it's freezing up in the middle of the game please fix
Label: negative

Name: Hannah Bence
Text: I've played 3 games so far & all 3 have frozen up on me. Not sure it was worth the 4 bucks.
Label: negative

Name: Carla Shupp
Text: Game play is a little fun. All day nithing but freezing, can't finish a game.
Label: positive

Name: Bontiea Thomas
Text: I like the game but I'm really tired of it freezing. I wish y'all fix this problem.
Label: negative

Name: Christopher Baran
Text: The Game of Life is my favorite board game and The Game of Life 2 makes it so much bettter and more fun.
Label: positive

Name: Bethany Livingston
Text: The game keeps freezing, twice now over the course of 3 games! Trash!
Label: negative

Name: Kristen Durstenfeld
Text: Just downloaded this today and it has already frozen about 7 times üòë Game play is really fun when it works...

Text: The graphics are beautiful and there are virtually no glitches!!!!

Name: Stuart Campbell
Text: Frozen at the end second game. To easy to win and short. Kind of a ripoff

Text: Game keeps freezing at times and uninstalling and reinstalling doesn't help.

Name: Sue M
Text: My games keep freezing up. It's very annoying. A refund would ne nice
